description.@en: When processed, opium can be used as a painkiller. For us, however, it expands our minds and allows us to forget the drudgeries of life.

effect.@en:
Effect: After ingestion, you are Unconscious. However, your Peril Condition Track is restored to Unharmed.

Other Considerations: This Drug cannot be applied to a weapon. You can only take Opium once every twentyfour hours. Using it more than once causes you to move one step down the Peril Condition Track negatively.
